name: Point and Click (Leslie Tang)
description:
Please first play Interactive Demo for context: https://leslie-tang.itch.io/interactive-demo. You are a bird who is seeking revenge on your local college student. Bird droppings didn't work. Peck them instead.

1. Scream by AlineAudio from freesound.org
2. Synth Voice Hello by Fupicat from freesound.org
3. Good by syseQ from freesound.org
3. Alley Cat by Geographer from Youtube Audio Library
